title: Cleanup/remove application sign-off
body_html:
As @pgaspar already pointed out in #699 , there is a lot of unused / duplicated code related to signing-off Applications and ApplicationDrafts causing confusion for anyone not familiar with previous iterations of the Teams App's internal processes.

  • Anything related to signing-off Applications is now moved over to the Mentor::Application model
  • Signing-off ApplicationDrafts is not used any more (none of the ApplicationDrafts from this season was signed-off and the code is not invoked from anywhere)

Therefore, in order to not grow legacy, I think it should be fine to remove this logic and deprecate the attributes @beanieboi -way until the selection process is over and they can be fully removed.

body:
As @pgaspar already pointed out in #699 , there is a lot of unused / duplicated code related to signing-off `Applications` and `ApplicationDrafts` causing confusion for anyone not familiar with previous iterations of the Teams App's internal processes.

* Anything related to signing-off `Applications` is now moved over to the `Mentor::Application` model
* Signing-off `ApplicationDrafts` is not used any more _(none of the `ApplicationDrafts` from this season was signed-off and the code is not invoked from anywhere)_

Therefore, in order to not grow legacy, I think it should be fine to remove this logic and deprecate the attributes @beanieboi -way until the selection process is over and they can be fully removed.
